Alexa Skill – INGENIUM® ZB – description

Description
ABOUT THIS SKILL
This skill works with INGENIUM® ZB Gateway.

With the INGENIUM® ZB skill for Alexa, you can now control a wide range of Works with INGENIUM® ZB devices such as connected lights, switches and dimmers with your voice.

For example:
· Alexa, turn on the Bedroom light
· Alexa, turn off the Hallway lights
· Alexa, dim the Living Room lights
· Alexa, dim the Living Room lights to 25 percent
· Alexa, brighten the Kitchen lights
· Alexa, brighten the Kitchen lights to 75 percent
· Alexa, set the Bedroom lights to green
· Alexa, set the Living Room lights to red
· Alexa, set the Living Room lights to warm white
· Alexa, turn on the Wake up scene
· Alexa, turn on coffee machine
· Alexa, turn on air-conditioner

GETTING STARTED

To get started, select the “Enable Skill” button in the Alexa App to link your INGENIUM® ZB account and discover your devices.

There are three ways that you can control devices using the INGENIUM® ZB skill for Alexa:

1. INGENIUM® ZB Devices: You can use the device names you set up already in the INGENIUM® ZB app to control individual devices. For example:
· Alexa, turn on the Bedroom Light 1
· Alexa, turn off the Living Room Lamp
· Alexa, brighten the Kitchen Light

2. INGENIUM® ZB Scene: You can use the routine scene you set up already in the INGENIUM® ZB app to control multiple devices.
For example:
· Alexa, turn on Wake up
· Alexa, turn on Good Night
· Alexa, turn on Reading Time

INGENIUM® ZB users must set up and managed their scene via the INGENIUM® ZB mobile app.

3. Alexa Groups: You can also use Alexa groups to control multiple devices, though it is recommended to only include similar types of devices with an Alexa group. For example:
· Alexa, turn on the Bedroom Lights
· Alexa, dim the Living Room Lights
· Alexa, brighten the Kitchen Lights

Note: The INGENIUM® ZB skill for Alexa can use INGENIUM® ZB scene to control compatible lights, switches and dimmers.
